title: Orange Malachite Warp Development and Sampling
description: Fabric variations using \"Orange Malachite\" warp of orange and yellow-orange threads. Orange & gold warp. Yellow, Drk gold, metallic gold & bronze  weft. Plain weave vaiation.  Spaced weft: 1.25\" open warp at random intervals. Yellow dominates. Left selvedge. (orange, gold, metallic green, yellow)
